snippet: Elected Republicans deny climate change and moderate unelected Republicans who recognize it are in denial that the deniers will smarten up.
abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column places blame for denial of climate change and negative consequences of that denial squarely on shoulders of Republican Party; contends Republicans' refusal to recognize scientific fact or take action is unusual in that it is orthodoxy enforced by entire party and has no counterpart abroad; urges moderate Republicans to take firm stand against party's extremists and calls on political journalists to show clearly how this delusional denial is endangering world.
lead_paragraph: Elected Republicans deny climate change and moderate unelected Republicans who recognize it are in denial that the deniers will smarten up.
